about_the_game:
Journal of the Travellers' Aid Society Volume 5

Welcome to the Journal of the Travellers' Aid Society, your indispensable guide to adventuring in the Far Future.
Each volume is a treasure trove of information and game additions for Traveller, including adventures, new ships, alien creatures from across Charted Space, philosophical musings on the big empires, histories, different takes on familiar equipment, new vehicles, characters to be met in starports, playable alien races, and much, much more...
In Volume Five, you will find:
  • Adventure: Chariots of Fire
  • Adventure: The Lost Village
  • Alien: Virushi
  • Bestiary: Beaked Monkey, Bloodvark, Sea Bear
  • Central Supply: IISS Field Equipment
  • Charted Space: World Security Profiles
  • Charted Space: Fasten Your Seatbelt
  • Charted Space: Salvage Rights
  • Charted Space: Extremophiles
  • Charted Space: Black Market
  • Encounters: Ramon Sanyarvo
  • High Guard: Jump Boats
  • High Guard: Jump Boat Tender
  • High Guard: Towing Ship
  • High Guard: Space Combat Primer
  • Travelling: Damage Control Operations
  • Travelling: Call Out the Guard
  • Vehicle Handbook: F-500 Field Power Unit
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Colin Richardson

Journal of the Travellers' Aid Society Volume 5

Welcome to the Journal of the Travellers' Aid Society, your indispensable guide to adventuring in the Far Future.
Each volume is a treasure trove of information and game additions for Traveller, including adventures, new ships, alien creatures from across Charted Space, philosophical musings on the big empires, histories, different takes on familiar equipment, new vehicles, characters to be met in starports, playable alien races, and much, much more...
In Volume Five, you will find:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
